Although that rule may be re-written soon, I have to agree with SoulStice for 
now. If it has a CR, and can fit an amount of troops such as the Predacons, 
it would count as a base. For now that aplies, but he rule may be changed 
soon. The RPG has expanded far enough to require shuttles and transport ships 
with onboard CR chambers, and crafts like that.

So, you'll have to repair your bots by hand for now.
